basic.name: Basic Plan
basic.description: The Basic plan costs $29 per month and allows you to create up to 10 videos per month with 720p resolution.

pro.name: Pro Plan
pro.description: The Pro plan costs $79 per month and offers unlimited video creation with 4K resolution and AI-powered captions.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.description: No refunds after 7 days. If you cancel within 7 days of purchase, you are eligible for a full refund.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: 24/7 support available only on Pro plan. Basic plan users have access to email support during business hours.
